nodes.text: Hunter Lead, also known as Hunt Leader, was the call sign given to the leader of the ersatz Hunter Squadron formed by five members of Rogue Squadron during their infiltration of Imperial Center in 7 ABY. Corran Horn served as Hunter Lead in a Z-95 Headhunter, but sabotage conducted by fellow pilot Erisi Dlarit, who was in fact an Imperial spy, caused Horn to crash and become imprisoned in Lusankya.
